html:
Aug 2 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Bike24 Holding, Erste Group Bank and Iliad, on Monday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Bike24 Holding AG BIKE.DE: Berenberg initiates coverage with buy rating

* Erste Group Bank AG ERST.VI: JP Morgan raises to overweight from neutral

* FMC AG FMEG.DE: Independent Research cuts to hold from buy

* Iliad ILD.PA: HSBC cuts to hold from buy

* MTU Aero Engines AG MTXGn.DE: HSBC cuts to hold from buy

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Monday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.
